title: What are databases used for in a company? - Quora

response.answer_text: Databases are the crown jewels of any company or organization. What is a customer list worth to a company? Everything. Plants can be rebuilt and employees can be replaced but customers are the lifeblood of any business. Aside from that, what about accounts receivable databases. What do you do if you don’t know who owes you money? What about inventory databases? How well to you survive if you don’t know what products you have on hand and what you have on order? These uses are just scratching the surface. Databases are at the core of any organization.
